lkb41_SpotifyKnockoff

Class SongUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • lkb41_SpotifyKnockoff.SongUtilities

  • public class SongUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    SongUtilities Class Provides static methods to create, update and delete songs. This class utilizes JPA to connect to the database and perform any additions, updates, or deletions within our database tables.
    Author:
    lbley Created: 02/22/18

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SongUtilities()
      Default constructor makes call to super

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Song CreateSong(java.lang.String title, double length, java.lang.String releaseDate, java.lang.String recordDate)
      CreateSong method takes parameters and creates a song object that also inserts the song instance into the database utilizing JPA.
      static void DeleteSong(java.lang.String songID)
      DeleteSong method takes a songID as parameter and uses that id to find the song instance in the database (utilizing the find method of emanager).
      static void UpdateSong(java.lang.String songID)
      UpdateSong method takes a songID as input.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SongUtilities

        public SongUtilities()
        Default constructor makes call to super

    • Method Detail

      • CreateSong

        public static Song CreateSong(java.lang.String title,
                              double length,
                              java.lang.String releaseDate,
                              java.lang.String recordDate)
        CreateSong method takes parameters and creates a song object that also inserts the song instance into the database utilizing JPA. It returns a Song object to the user.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the song
        length - the length of the song (in minutes)
        releaseDate - the date the song was released
        recordDate - the date the song was recorded
        Returns:
        the Song object created

      • UpdateSong

        public static void UpdateSong(java.lang.String songID)
        UpdateSong method takes a songID as input. The user is prompted to enter changes to the song properties - if there are no changes to make to a property, they are instructed to leave the field blank. the EntityManager finds this song instance, creates a Song object with it, adjusts the properties IF they were changed, and then commits these changes to the database.
        Parameters:
        songID - id of the song you want to update

      • DeleteSong

        public static void DeleteSong(java.lang.String songID)
        DeleteSong method takes a songID as parameter and uses that id to find the song instance in the database (utilizing the find method of emanager). This song will then be removed from the database.
        Parameters:
        songID - id of the song you want to delete
